review: I own an Apple TV, Chromecast, Roku(1st gen) and 2 Fire TV Sticks. I use the Fire TV Sticks the most. The picture is great. There is a wide variety of apps. Getting one free for a three month subscription to Sling TV was well worth the investment. We cut the cord and do not miss cable at all, between AmazonBasics Ultra-Thin Amplified Indoor HDTV Antenna - 50 Mile Range and the Fire TV Sticks, I am getting all the TV I need.
